fields.label: Thumbnail Image
fields.name: thumbnail_image
fields.instructions: Thumbnail image to be displayed in the college grid at the bottom of each college page.

fields.label: Lead CTA Text
fields.name: lead_cta_text
fields.instructions: Text to display in the call-to-action button underneath the lead section.  If not provided, "Visit [college URL]" will be displayed instead.

fields.label: Lead CTA URL
fields.name: lead_cta_url
fields.instructions: A custom URL to use on the lead call-to-action button.  If not provided, the College URL will be used instead.

fields.label: Top Degrees Heading
fields.name: top_degrees_heading
fields.instructions: Text to display in a heading text and toggle button text for mobile above the college's Top Degrees list.  If left blank, "Top College Degrees" will be used.

fields.label: Extra Degrees Heading
fields.name: top_degrees_custom_heading
fields.instructions: Optional heading and toggle button to insert between the college's Top Degrees and any extra degree list items defined below.  Will only be displayed if at least one extra degree link is defined.

fields.label: Extra Degrees
fields.name: top_degrees_custom
fields.instructions: Optionally add one or more custom links to the bottom of the college's Top Degrees list.  If an Extra Degrees Heading is defined above, these links will be displayed in a separate list separated by that heading instead.

sub_fields.label: Top Degree Custom Text
sub_fields.name: top_degree_custom_text
sub_fields.instructions: Link text to be displayed for the custom top degree.

sub_fields.label: Top Degree Custom Link
sub_fields.name: top_degree_custom_link
sub_fields.instructions: Degree search link for the custom top degree.

fields.label: Enable Request Info Button/Modal
fields.name: degree_custom_enable_rfi
fields.instructions: If enabled, the 'Request Information' modal and button will be included on the degree profile. Note: This feature is currently only available for graduate programs that have an imported Slate GUID.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: An icon to supplement the program's duration.

sub_fields.label: Number
sub_fields.name: number
sub_fields.instructions: The actual program length value, e.g. "30", "12-24"

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.instructions: Units of measure, and/or supplementary info about the program length.

fields.label: Badges/Promotional Graphics
fields.message: Note: if no badge/promo graphics are set below, fallback badge(s) defined in the Customizer will be displayed on this degree's profile instead.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: A badge, trust symbol, or other promotional graphic relevant to this degree.

sub_fields.label: Alt Text
sub_fields.name: image_alt
sub_fields.instructions: Text that describes the contents of the badge/promo graphic. Required for the graphic to be displayed on the degree profile.

sub_fields.label: Link URL
sub_fields.name: link_url
sub_fields.instructions: An optional URL that this graphic should link out to.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: A badge, trust symbol, or other promotional graphic relevant to this degree.

sub_fields.label: Alt Text
sub_fields.name: image_alt
sub_fields.instructions: Text that describes the contents of the badge/promo graphic. Required for the graphic to be displayed on the degree profile.

sub_fields.label: Link URL
sub_fields.name: link_url
sub_fields.instructions: An optional URL that this graphic should link out to.

fields.message: Note: these settings only apply to degrees that display a catalog description (i.e. don't have a custom Degree Description set.)

fields.label: Disable Sidebar Promo
fields.name: degree_disable_sidebar_promo
fields.instructions: If checked, the promo graphic set in the Customizer for this type of degree will not be displayed on this degree's profile. Only applicable when this degree displays a catalog description (and not a custom description).

fields.message: Note: this content is only displayed on this degree's profile if a Degree Description is set below; otherwise, the degree's imported catalog description will be shown.

fields.label: Description Heading
fields.name: modern_description_heading
fields.instructions: Optional heading text to display above the degree description.

fields.label: Degree Description
fields.name: modern_description_copy
fields.instructions: A unique description for this degree.  Replaces the degree's catalog description on this degree's profile.

fields.label: Show Subplan List
fields.name: show_subplan_list
fields.instructions: When checked, a list of program tracks/options and their excerpts will be displayed underneath this program's unique degree description if this program has at least one subplan.  Not applicable when the Degree Description is empty.

fields.label: Description Image
fields.name: modern_description_image
fields.instructions: An optional graphic to display alongside this degree's description.

fields.label: Description Image Alt Text
fields.name: modern_description_image_alt
fields.instructions: Alt text for the Description Image above.  Not required, but should be set if the Description Image is not purely decorative or contains text.

fields.label: Highlights
fields.name: highlights
fields.instructions: A list of selling points/highlighted information about this program.

fields.label: Disable Deadlines
fields.name: disable_deadlines
fields.instructions: If checked, application deadlines will not be displayed on this degree's profile.

fields.label: Alternate Section
fields.name: alternate_deadlines_section
fields.instructions: Specify an alternate Section post to display in lieu of the standard Application Deadlines section on this degree's profile.  This value takes precedence over the Undergraduate/Graduate Fallback Section values in the Customizer.

fields.label: Deadlines
fields.name: application_deadlines
fields.instructions: Specify a list of application deadlines to display on this degree's profile.  If provided, this list replaces the list of imported deadlines assigned to this degree.

sub_fields.label: Deadline Term
sub_fields.name: deadline_term
sub_fields.instructions: e.g. "Fall", "Spring", "Summer"

fields.label: Start Application Image
fields.name: start_application_image
fields.instructions:
Image to be displayed to the left of the Start Your Application heading, copy and steps. The image will be hidden in the xs, sm and md breakpoints.

The image should be a square 450px by 450px JPG with the focus of the image in the center. The circular crop is handled with CSS.

fields.label: Start Your Application Heading
fields.name: start_application_heading
fields.instructions: The heading to be displayed in the Start Your Application section. Defaults to 'Start Your Application Today'.

fields.label: Start Your Application Lead Copy
fields.name: start_application_lead_copy
fields.instructions: Lead copy displayed under the Start Your Application heading. Defaults to 'Ready to get started? Take the next step to save your spot at UCF.'
fields.default_value: Ready to get started? Take the next step to save your spot at UCF.

fields.label: Start Your Application Steps
fields.name: start_application_steps
fields.instructions: The Start Your Application section will only display if the Step One, Step Two, Button Copy and Button Link fields are filled.

sub_fields.label: Step One Copy
sub_fields.name: step_one_copy
sub_fields.instructions: The copy displayed in the Start Your Application section's Step 1 box.

sub_fields.label: Step Two Copy
sub_fields.name: step_two_copy
sub_fields.instructions: The copy displayed in the Start Your Application section's Step 2 box.

fields.label: Course Overview
fields.name: course_overview
fields.instructions: Enter content to be added to the Course Overview Section.

sub_fields.label: Course Title
sub_fields.name: course_title
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the course title

sub_fields.label: Course Description
sub_fields.name: course_description
sub_fields.instructions: Enter the course description

fields.label: Catalog Link Text
fields.name: course_catalog_link_text
fields.instructions: Enter the text to be used for the link below the course list in the Course Overview section. If left blank the following text will be used "View all [Degree Name] Courses".

fields.label: Degree Quotes
fields.name: degree_quotes
fields.instructions: Add quotes to be displayed on the degree page.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: degree_quote_image
sub_fields.instructions: Optional image of the person quoted.

sub_fields.label: Image Alt Text
sub_fields.name: degree_quote_image_alt
sub_fields.instructions: Enter text to be used for the image alt attribute.

sub_fields.label: Quote
sub_fields.name: degree_quote
sub_fields.instructions: Quote to be displayed

sub_fields.label: Footer
sub_fields.name: degree_quote_footer
sub_fields.instructions: The footer should contain the name, title (with cite tag) and company of the person quoted.

fields.message: Note: If the Skills List field below is left empty, only career opportunities will be displayed in this section on this degree's profile (as well as fallback copy defined in the Customizer.)

fields.label: Skills Heading
fields.name: degree_skills_heading
fields.instructions: Heading text to display above the degree's list of learnable skills.  If a value for this field isn't provided and skills are set below, this heading's text will be "Skills You'll Learn".

fields.label: Skills List
fields.name: degree_skills_list
fields.instructions: A list of learnable skills provided by this degree.

fields.label: Career Opportunites Heading
fields.name: degree_careers_heading
fields.instructions: Heading text to display alongside the degree's list of potential careers.  If a value for this field isn't provided, this heading's text will be "Career Opportunities".

fields.label: Career Opportunities
fields.name: degree_career_list
fields.instructions: Specify a list of career opportunities to display on this degree's profile.  If provided, this list replaces the list of Career Path terms assigned to this degree.

fields.label: Admission Requirements Copy
fields.name: admission_copy
fields.instructions: A general description of admissions requirements for this program.

fields.label: Admission Requirements Highlights
fields.name: admission_list
fields.instructions: Additional admissions requirements that are highlighted in a white box next to the general requirements copy.  A good place for adding bulleted lists or other small chunks of information that need extra prominence.

fields.label: UCF Online Heading
fields.name: degree_online_heading
fields.instructions: The heading to be displayed in the UCF Online callout section.

fields.label: UCF Online Copy
fields.name: degree_online_copy
fields.instructions: Copy displayed under the UCF Online callout heading.

fields.label: UCF Online Button
fields.name: degree_online_button
fields.instructions: Button displayed under the UCF Online callout section copy.

fields.label: UCF Online Image
fields.name: degree_online_image
fields.instructions:
Image to be displayed to the right of the UCF Online heading, copy and button. The image will be hidden in the xs, sm and md breakpoints.

The image should be a square 300px by 300px JPG with the focus of the image in the center. The circular crop is handled with CSS.

fields.label: News Title
fields.name: degree_news_title
fields.instructions: Enter header to be added to the News Section

fields.label: News Tag
fields.name: degree_news_tag
fields.instructions: Specify the tag slug to pull UCF Today stories from for this program.

fields.label: Spotlight
fields.name: degree_spotlight
fields.instructions: Select the spotlight to use for this degree.

fields.label: Enable Request Info Button/Modal
fields.name: degree_custom_enable_rfi
fields.instructions:
If enabled, the 'Request Information' modal and button will be included on the degree profile. Note: This feature is currently only available for graduate programs that have an imported Slate GUID.

If enabled and you'd like to display a button that opens the RFI modal somewhere else on the page, you can create add a [modal-toggle] shortcode with the target set to '#requestInfoModal'.
Example: [modal-toggle class="btn btn-complementary" target="#requestInfoModal"]Button Copy Here[/modal-toggle]

fields.label: Hide Colleges Grid
fields.name: degree_custom_hide_colleges_grid
fields.instructions: Determines if the colleges grid is hidden from displaying above the footer.

fields.label: Promo Section
fields.name: person_promo_section
fields.instructions: Select an existing Section to display at the bottom of the faculty member's profile.  This will be shown in lieu of the Faculty Promo Default Section set in the Customizer, if set.

fields.label: Header Content - Type of Content
fields.name: page_header_content_type
fields.instructions: Specify the type of content that should be displayed within the header.  Choose "Title and subtitle" to display a styled page title and optional subtitle, or choose "Custom content" to add any arbitrary content.  If "Custom content" is selected, a page title and subtitle are NOT included by default and should be added manually.

fields.label: Header Title Text
fields.name: page_header_title
fields.instructions: Overrides the page title.

fields.label: Page h1
fields.name: page_header_h1
fields.instructions: Specify which part of the page title to use as the h1 for the page.  Styling of the title/subtitle will not be affected by this choice.

fields.label: Header Content Position
fields.name: page_header_content_position
fields.instructions: Determines which side of the header the title and subtitle are aligned against.  Not applicable when a header background isn't set.

fields.label: Header Height (sm+)
fields.name: page_header_height
fields.instructions: Height of the page header at the -sm breakpoint and above.

fields.label: Header Image (-sm+)
fields.name: page_header_image
fields.instructions: Header image to display at the -sm breakpoint and up.

fields.label: Header Image (-xs)
fields.name: page_header_image_xs
fields.instructions: Header image to display at the -xs breakpoint.

fields.label: Header Video (MP4)
fields.name: page_header_mp4
fields.instructions: If a MP4 video is defined, video will be used instead of an image in the header at the -sm breakpoint and higher.  Note that videos will never be displayed at the -xs breakpoint, so a fallback header image should always be provided when using video.

fields.label: Header Video (WebM)
fields.name: page_header_webm
fields.instructions: Supplemental video format used by supported browsers for optimized performance.  Note that a MP4 must at least be provided for video to be displayed in the header.

fields.label: Header Video Loop
fields.name: page_header_video_loop
fields.instructions: If checked, and a header video is available, the header video will loop indefinitely.

fields.label: Phonebook CTAs
fields.name: phonebook_ctas
fields.instructions: HTML to be displayed under the phone book search before a search.

fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: section_background_color
fields.instructions: Select the background color of the section.

fields.label: Text Color
fields.name: section_text_color
fields.instructions:
Override the default text color within the section.

Note that if you picked a predefined color in the Background Color field, an accessible text color will already be applied.

fields.label: Background Image (-sm+)
fields.name: section_background_image
fields.instructions: The background image to display behind the section at the -sm breakpoint and up (576px+ wide).

fields.label: Background Image (-xs)
fields.name: section_background_image_xs
fields.instructions: The background image to display behind the section at the -xs breakpoint (<=575px wide).  This image is only displayed when a -sm background image has also been selected.

fields.label: Add Content Container
fields.name: section_add_content_container
fields.instructions: If checked, the content will be wrapped in a container.

fields.label: Degree ID
fields.name: degree_id
fields.instructions: A unique identifier for the degree.

fields.label: Search Service Degree ID
fields.name: degree_api_id
fields.instructions: The ID assigned to the program in the UCF Search Service.

fields.label: Graduate Slate ID
fields.name: graduate_slate_id
fields.instructions: The GUID of this program in Graduate Studies' Slate instance. (Applies to graduate programs only)

fields.label: Lock Excerpt
fields.name: degree_lock_excerpt
fields.instructions: When locked, degree excerpts will not be updated during import.

fields.label: Is Online
fields.name: degree_online
fields.instructions: Whether or not the degree is an online program.

fields.label: Outcome Academic Year
fields.name: degree_outcome_academic_year
fields.instructions: The academic year of the graduates represented in the outcome data to the right.

fields.label: Average Annual Earnings
fields.name: degree_avg_annual_earnings
fields.instructions: The average annual earnings of graduates who are employed full time from the graduating class of the Outcome Academic Year

fields.label: Employed Full Time (%)
fields.name: degree_employed_full_time
fields.instructions: The percentage of graduates from the Outcome Academic Year that were employed full time at the time of the NCES survey.

fields.label: Continuing Education (%)
fields.name: degree_continuing_education
fields.instructions: The percentage of graduates from the Outcome Academic Year that were pursuing additional education at the time of the NCES survey.

fields.label: Report Year Start
fields.name: degree_prj_begin_year
fields.instructions: The start year in the data projection.

fields.label: Report Year End
fields.name: degree_prj_end_year
fields.instructions: The end year in the data projection

fields.label: Beginning Employment
fields.name: degree_prj_begin_employment
fields.instructions: The estimated number of positions available for graduates with this degree in the start year of the report.

fields.label: Projected Employment
fields.name: degree_prj_end_employment
fields.instructions: The projected number of positions for graduates with this degree by the end year of the report.

fields.label: Projected New Positions
fields.name: degree_prj_change
fields.instructions: The projected change in the number of positions available between the start and end year.

fields.label: Projected New Positions Percentage
fields.name: degree_prj_change_percentage
fields.instructions: The projected change in the number of positions available between the start and end year as a precentage.

fields.label: Projected Openings
fields.name: degree_prj_openings
fields.instructions: The projected number of openings for graduates with this degree within the report's timeframe.

sub_fields.label: Role Name
sub_fields.name: role_name
sub_fields.instructions: Generally this is the name of the degree conferred.

sub_fields.label: Education Put Code
sub_fields.name: education_put_code
sub_fields.instructions: The number from ORCID which identifies the record. Used for import purposes.

fields.label: Disable UCF Header
fields.name: page_disable_ucf_header
fields.instructions: If checked, the UCF Header will not be loaded.

fields.label: Exclude Primary Site Navigation
fields.name: page_header_exclude_nav
fields.instructions: Controls whether or not the primary site navigation should be displayed at the top of the page.

fields.label: Disable UCF Footer
fields.name: page_disable_ucf_footer
fields.instructions: If checked, the UCF Footer will not be loaded.

fields.label: Critical CSS
fields.name: critical_css
fields.instructions:
Copy and paste critical CSS to utilize on this page. Do not include <style> tags. If critical CSS is provided, it will be inserted at the very top of the document, and enqueued stylesheets will be asynchronously loaded.

Critical CSS should be generated by a developer using a service such as Critical any time more than basic text changes are made to the page header or content immediately underneath it (including Section content) that qualifies as being "above the fold" on desktop or mobile devices.
